name: Combat Pong
description:
Combat Pong.

4 Player Pong with Stage Hazards and "Paddle Skills"

Made in Unity, Active Development since Oct 2022 in personal spare time.

Alpha version 0.4 ......still plenty of bugs and untested

Full Keyboard and controller support. 

Comments, Ideas, Feature Requests , Suggestions, Feedback, Bug testing welcome.

Reach me @ Suicidal_de@hotmail.com
